title: Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 7 Bespoke Edition is on Sale with up to 24% OFF!
description: Get it for just $250. The post Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 7 Bespoke Edition is on Sale with up to 24% OFF! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
text: If you’ve been wanting to get your hands on the Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 Bespoke Edition, then this deal might be the perfect opportunity for you. Launched not too long ago, it packs some nifty upgrades over Samsung’s older smartwatches without going overboard on the price. In terms of design, the Galaxy Watch7 comes with a classic Galaxy watch design as seen on earlier models, and is available in 40mm and 44mm variants. For health monitoring, the device packs an enhanced BioActive Sensor and allows users to track over 100 workouts and create routines with the Workout Routine feature. Under the hood, the devices packs a 3nm processor, which Samsung says is three times faster than previous versions and boasts 30% improved power efficiency. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart. html:
If you’ve been wanting to get your hands on the Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 Bespoke Edition, then this deal might be the perfect opportunity for you. Launched not too long ago, it packs some nifty upgrades over Samsung’s older smartwatches without going overboard on the price.

In terms of design, the Galaxy Watch7 comes with a classic Galaxy watch design as seen on earlier models, and is available in 40mm and 44mm variants. For health monitoring, the device packs an enhanced BioActive Sensor and allows users to track over 100 workouts and create routines with the Workout Routine feature. Under the hood, the devices packs a 3nm processor, which Samsung says is three times faster than previous versions and boasts 30% improved power efficiency.
